product_name: The North Face Light Boot-Top Long Underwear Bottoms - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Cut to hit above your socks and boots, The North Face Light Boot-Top long underwear bottoms boost your warmth during adventures in cool weather. Moisture-wicking polyester and polyolefin fabric features FlashDry(TM) microparticles embedded in the fabric to dramatically improve dry time and breathability. Made of crushed coconut husks and crushed volcanic rock, the FlashDry fabric additive leads to faster dry times and will not wash out. You'll move without restriction thanks to the stretchy fabric and flat seams, which are designed to enhance motion. Functional fly. The North Face Light long underwear tights offer a relaxed fit that skims the body.
